Content: The department of Meteorology says mainly fair weather will prevail over most parts of the country and the surrounding sea area of the Island. However, a few showers are likely in the Sabaragamuwa and Southern provinces. Fairly strong winds at times can be expected over the island, particularly over western slopes of the central hills. However, a few showers may occur in the sea areas off the coast extending from Colombo to Hambantota via Galle and Matara. Winds will be south-westerly in direction and speed will be 30-40 kmph. The sea area extending from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar and the sea area extending from Pottuvil to Matara via Hambantota may be rough at times as the wind speed can be increased up to 60 kmph.
